page.title: 20Langtoft Domesday Surveyors
page.content: The Langtoft Domesday Survey was compiled by Langtoft Juniors.The people who contributed were Wendy Richardson,Dawn Overfield,Lynda Richardson,Louise Burton,Lucy Dixon, Joanne Kellington,Donna Midgley,Susie Cheetham,Sadie Lawty,Fiona Crawford, Camille Bradley,Darren Hollingsworth, Mark Ullyott,James Burton,David Ullyott,Alan Bailey,Stephen Lawty, Shane Brent and Peter Sharp. They were helped by Mrs.Cheetham,Mrs. Hollingsworth,Mrs.Kellington,Mrs. Bailey and Mrs.Lawty.The teachers that helped were Mr.Bailey,Mr.Gunning and Mrs.Hughes.
